name: Cow Abduction (pixxy)
description:
Controls & Instructions

Use A & D or Left and Right Arrows to move

Click the beam button to turn on and off your beam

If you abduct enough cows you unlock other ability buttons like, Heal 1 HP, Speed Up, and, Blow Up a Bomb

Avoid bombs otherwise you will lose 1 HP (And 3 points)

Once you get to 0 HP you blow up and lose
